title: Badd logo
content:
Very bad...

Hello everybody. I have bought the domain name [http://badd.pl](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419225813/http:/badd.pl/ "http://badd.pl") and this is the logo for my new domain name. I think that I am going to sell this domain so the logo has been done just for fun.

Please tell me what do you think.

link: [http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/751/baddpond.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419225813/http:/img269.imageshack.us/img269/751/baddpond.png "http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/751/baddpond.png")
author: smylek
